name: Mary PISTORIUS, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of John J. Pistorius, Deceased, v. The TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Raymond K. CRAWFORD

parties: Mary PISTORIUS, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of John J. Pistorius, Deceased, v. The TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Raymond K. CRAWFORD.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 89 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
516 A.2d 1186
Mary PISTORIUS, Individually and as Administratrix of the Estate of John J. Pistorius, Deceased, v. The TRAVELERS INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Raymond K. CRAWFORD.

Nov. 6, 1986.
